data.name: Red Fox and the Four Seasons - Design My Forest
data.detailed_description:
Are you addicted to design & decorating? You can play with it now to design your dream forest with the most adorable foxes!

Design My Forest is a fun decorating game with all kinds of items to design your forest. Click on the item and place it on the map and create your own unique Fox forest. This game is designed for kids and adults who love cute things. No time to waste! Come on and play the game now!

With this DLC you can decorate the summer & spring map with many animals and items.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP, Vista, 7, 8, 10
  • Processor: Pentium 4 or higher, 2GHz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 128MB or higher
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
